title: Mathematics Instructional Design Simulation for e-Learning Motivation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics pedagogy and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Collaborative approach where pre-service teachers experiment with motivation strategies in virtual classroom environments and exchange feedback

learning_goals: Learners can analyze learnersâ€™ motivation levels in e-learning environments across three dimensions (stimulation, meaning, usability) using VR simulations.
Learners can implement motivation strategies by applying the principles of "organized content delivery" and "user-friendly interface" to math lesson design.
Learners can create e-learning activity plans through resource sharing with peer teachers and measure them using project-based assessment tools.

resources: Digital Resource Library for Mathematics Education
